name: Cherry Cotton Macrame Friendship Bracelet
description:
Navy Cotton Macrame Friendship Bracelet
$14.99
On Sale

    Image of Navy Cotton Macrame Friendship Bracelet
    Image of Navy Cotton Macrame Friendship Bracelet

These modern bracelets are handwoven with 100% cotton thread and feature a row of 5 small beads. Layer them with your other bracelets for a custom and unique look, or wear them alone to add a simple and clean statement to your everyday wardrobe.

Design area is approximately 5 inches (with two 5 inch tails that can be tied on and/or cut down to size)

All bracelets are made to order. Please allow 3-6 business days for shipping.

Want this item in another color? Check out the contact page and make your custom request.

name: Beaded Friendship Bracelet - Silver Green Blue Pink and White
description:
Loom beaded bracelet made using 100% Cotton DMC thread and Czech Glass Seed Beads. Each handmade bracelet has a design length of 4-6 inches and two 5 inch tails for a custom fit for all.

Colors: Bright Silver, Olive Green, Turquoise, Salmon Pink & White

WANT ONE OF THESE DESIGNS IN DIFFERENT COLORS? JUST MESSAGE ME ABOUT A CUSTOM ORDER!
